reviewText: Title is about all I'd say about it.  Has some decent tricks, but it doesn't get into the finer nuances of working with stone tools or making shivs/shanks.  It's interesting, but it wasn't extensive.

Jason Hawk does an excellent job demonstrating the techniques needed to make these tools.
The section on knapping glass knives  is especially informative,
I have demonstrated and taught primitive Living skills for several years now, and I would not hesitate to recommend this DVD to anyone looking to learn to make fast and efficient survival weaponry!

-Waya
